or.comment: Possible conditions: area, location, time, entity

area.comment: possible triggers: enter, leave, inside, outside

location.comment_1: possible targets: <player name>, <npc name>, minecraft command selectors
location.comment_2: possible triggers: arrive, leave, there, away

entity.comment_1: possible properties: alive, health, saturation, effect
entity.comment_3: Value for 'alive' trigger can be 0 or 1, for effects it's the effect power
